AggregateFunction.description: An aggregate function for summarizing data.

op.description: The operation to apply (e.g., count, sum, mean, etc.).

ArcFieldMapping.description: A field mapping for arc marks.

ArcLayer.description: A layer for rendering arc marks.

ArcValueMapping.description: A value mapping for arc marks.

AreaFieldMapping.description: A field mapping for area marks.

AreaLayer.description: A layer for rendering area marks.

AreaValueMapping.description: A value mapping for area marks.

BarFieldMapping.description: A field mapping for bar marks.

BarLayer.description: A layer for rendering bar marks.

BarValueMapping.description: A value mapping for bar marks.

BinBy.description: Bins data into intervals for a specified field.

bins.description: The number of bins to create. Optional.

nice.description: Whether to use "nice" bin boundaries. Optional.

output.description: Output field names for the bin start and end. Optional.

in.description: The name of the input table. If not specified, it assumes the output of the previous operation.

out.description: The name of the output table. If not specified, it overwrites the name of the previous table.

CategoryFieldUnion.description: Field Unions require a list of fields, and the domain is the union of the fields. Or if a.domain = ['cat', 'dog'], b.domain = ['cat', 'mouse'], then the domain is ['cat', 'dog', 'mouse'].

DataSelection.description: Configuration for data selection in visualizations or tables.

fields.description: The fields selected from the data points. If not specified, all fields are selected.

how.description: How the data is selected in the visualization / table.

name.description: The name of the data selection.

on.description: The axis or axes to apply the selection on ('x', 'y', or both ('xy')).

DataSource.description: A single tabular data source. Currently, only CSV files are supported.

name.description: The unique name of the data source.

source.description: The URL of the CSV file.

DataTransformation.description: The possible data transformations. These include operations like grouping, filtering, joining, and more.

DataTypes.description: The possible data types for fields.

Derive.description: Derives new fields based on expressions.

derive.description: A mapping of output field names to derive expressions.

in.description: The name of the input table. If not specified, it assumes the output of the previous operation.

out.description: The name of the output table. If not specified, it overwrites the name of the previous table.

DeriveExpression.description: A derive expression, which can be a string or a rolling derive expression.

DirectionalOrder.description: Defines a sorting order and a field to sort by.

field.description: The name of the field to be sorted.

order.description: The sorting order for the field, either ascending ('asc') or descending ('desc').

Domain.description: Represents a domain for visual encodings. This can be a numerical domain, a string domain, or a field union.

FieldUnion.description: A union of field types, which can be either numerical or categorical.

Filter.description: Filters data based on a specified condition or selection.

in.description: The name of the input table. If not specified, it assumes the output of the previous operation.

out.description: The name of the output table. If not specified, it overwrites the name of the previous table.

FilterDataSelection.description: A data selection used for filtering.

match.description: Specifies whether to use 'all' or 'any' of the selected data in a 1-to-many mapping. Default is 'any'.

source.description: The name of the source table of the selection.

entityRelationship.description: The identifying columns from the source table and target table that describe the entity relationship.

originKey.description: The name of the column in the source table that identifies the entity.

targetKey.description: The name of the column in the target table that identifies the entity.

FilterExpression.description: A filter expression, which can be a string or a data selection.

GenericFieldMapping<ArcEncodingOptions>.description: A generic field mapping for visual encodings.

domain.description: The custom domain will change the scaling of visual encodings.

encoding.description: The encoding type (e.g., x, y, color).

field.description: The field to map to the encoding.

omitLegend.description: Set to true to omit the legend for this encoding.

range.description: The custom range will change the scaling of visual encodings.

type.description: The data type of the field (e.g., quantitative, ordinal, nominal).

domain.description: The custom domain will change the scaling of visual encodings.

omitLegend.description: Set to true to omit the legend for this encoding.

range.description: The custom range will change the scaling of visual encodings.

type.description: The data type of the field (e.g., quantitative, ordinal, nominal).

range.description: The custom range will change the scaling of visual encodings.

type.description: The data type of the field (e.g., quantitative, ordinal, nominal).

omitLegend.description: Set to true to omit the legend for this encoding.

range.description: The custom range will change the scaling of visual encodings.

type.description: The data type of the field (e.g., quantitative, ordinal, nominal).

GenericLayer<\"arc\",ArcMapping>.description: A generic layer for visualizing data.

mapping.description: The mapping of data fields or values to visual encodings.

mark.description: The type of mark used in the layer.

select.description: The data selection configuration for the layer. Optional.

GenericLayer<\"area\",AreaMapping>.description: A generic layer for visualizing data.

mapping.description: The mapping of data fields or values to visual encodings.

mark.description: The type of mark used in the layer.

select.description: The data selection configuration for the layer. Optional.

mapping.description: The mapping of data fields or values to visual encodings.

mark.description: The type of mark used in the layer.

select.description: The data selection configuration for the layer. Optional.

mapping.description: The mapping of data fields or values to visual encodings.

GenericValueMapping<ArcEncodingOptions>.description: A generic value mapping for visual encodings.

encoding.description: The encoding type (e.g., x, y, color).

value.description: The value to map to the encoding.

GenericValueMapping<AreaEncodingOptions>.description: A generic value mapping for visual encodings.

encoding.description: The encoding type (e.g., x, y, color).

value.description: The value to map to the encoding.

GenericValueMapping<BarEncodingOptions>.description: A generic value mapping for visual encodings.

encoding.description: The encoding type (e.g., x, y, color).

value.description: The value to map to the encoding.

GenericValueMapping<GeometryEncodingOpti.description: A generic value mapping for visual encodings.

encoding.description: The encoding type (e.g., x, y, color).

value.description: The value to map to the encoding.

GenericValueMapping<LineEncodingOptions>.description: A generic value mapping for visual encodings.

encoding.description: The encoding type (e.g., x, y, color).

value.description: The value to map to the encoding.

GenericValueMapping<PointEncodingOptions.description: A generic value mapping for visual encodings.

encoding.description: The encoding type (e.g., x, y, color).

value.description: The value to map to the encoding.

GenericValueMapping<RectEncodingOptions>.description: A generic value mapping for visual encodings.

encoding.description: The encoding type (e.g., x, y, color).

value.description: The value to map to the encoding.

GenericValueMapping<TextEncodingOptions>.description: A generic value mapping for visual encodings.

encoding.description: The encoding type (e.g., x, y, color).

value.description: The value to map to the encoding.

GeometryFieldMapping.description: A field mapping for geometry marks.

GeometryLayer.description: A layer for rendering geometry marks.

GeometryValueMapping.description: A value mapping for geometry marks.

in.description: The name of the input table. If not specified, it assumes the output of the previous operation.

out.description: The name of the output table. If not specified, it overwrites the name of the previous table.

Join.description: Joins two tables based on a specified condition.

in.description: The names of the two input tables to join.

on.description: The field(s) to join on. If one field is specified, it's assumed to be the same in both tables. If two fields are specified, the first field is from the first table and the second field is from the second table.

out.description: The name of the output table. If not specified, it overwrites the name of the previous table.

KDE.description: Applies Kernel Density Estimation (KDE) to a specified field.

in.description: The name of the input table. If not specified, it assumes the output of the previous operation.

bandwidth.description: The bandwidth for the KDE. Optional.

field.description: The field to apply KDE to.

output.description: Output field names for the KDE results. Optional.

samples.description: The number of samples to generate. Optional.

out.description: The name of the output table. If not specified, it overwrites the name of the previous table.

LineFieldMapping.description: A field mapping for line marks.

LineLayer.description: A layer for rendering line marks.

LineValueMapping.description: A value mapping for line marks.

NumberDomain.description: Represents a numerical domain with a minimum and maximum value.

NumberFieldUnion.description: Field Unions require a list of fields, and the domain is the union of the fields. e.g. If a.domain = [0, 10], b.domain = [5, 15], then the domain is [0, 15].

OrderBy.description: Orders data by a specified field or fields.

in.description: The name of the input table. If not specified, it assumes the output of the previous operation.

orderby.description: The field(s) to order by, default in ascending order.

out.description: The name of the output table. If not specified, it overwrites the name of the previous table.

PointFieldMapping.description: A field mapping for point marks.

PointLayer.description: A layer for rendering point marks.

PointValueMapping.description: A value mapping for point marks.

RectFieldMapping.description: A field mapping for rect marks.

RectLayer.description: A layer for rendering rect marks.

RectValueMapping.description: A value mapping for rect marks.

Representation.description: A visual representation of the data, such as a chart or table.

Representations.description: A list of visual representations. Charts and tables cannot be intermixed.

RollUp.description: Aggregates data by applying specified functions to groups.

in.description: The name of the input table. If not specified, it assumes the output of the previous operation.

out.description: The name of the output table. If not specified, it overwrites the name of the previous table.

rollup.description: A mapping of output field names to aggregate functions.

RollingDeriveExpression.description: A rolling derive expression for creating new fields based on a rolling window.

rolling.description: Configuration for the rolling derive expression.

RowLayer.description: A layer for rendering row marks.

column.description: The target display column. If empty, the target column is based on the field name. This is needed so that you can construct columns that map multiple fields to the same mark within the column. E.g. a bar where the width is based on a quantitative field and the color is if based on a derived boolean field if the value is positive or negative.

domain.description: The custom domain will change the scaling of visual encodings.

encoding.description: The encoding type (e.g., x, y, color).

field.description: The field to map to the encoding.

mark.description: The type of mark used in the row layer.

omitLegend.description: Set to true to omit the legend for this encoding.

orderby.description: The value to use when sorting by the column in the interface. This will not affect the default sorting of the table. defaults to the field name.

range.description: The custom range will change the scaling of visual encodings.

type.description: The data type of the field (e.g., quantitative, ordinal, nominal).

StringDomain.description: Represents a string domain with a list of possible values.

TextFieldMapping.description: A field mapping for text marks.

TextLayer.description: A layer for rendering text marks.

TextValueMapping.description: A value mapping for text marks.

representation.description: The visual representation of the data as either a visualization or table. If not specificed the default is a table witha all fields.

source.description: The data source or data sources. This can be a single CSV file or a list of CSV files.

transformation.description: The data transformations applied to the source data before displaying the data.

VisualizationLayer.description: A visualization layer for rendering data. This can include various types of marks such as lines, bars, points, etc.
